entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 900 metres. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing overnight. Snow level 900 metres. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
